item.title: Scientific Python at Microscopy & MicroAnalysis 2019
item.description: Today, I presented a talk titled “Scientific Python: A Mature Computational Ecosystem for Microscopy” [PDF] at the Microscopy and MicroAnalysis conference in Portland. A few members of the audience familiar with scientific Python told me they had learned something, so I’ll highlight the few topics that I think may have qualified. SciPy 1.0 paper The first official release of SciPy was in 2001, and a mere 16 years later we reached 1.
